acf.small_title: Hyvä Theme is a modern frontend theme for Magento 2 that significantly improves performance, developer experience, and simplicity compared to the default Magento Luma theme. It is built from scratch using Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js, replacing Magento's traditional frontend stack (Knockout.js, RequireJS, UI Components) with a much leaner and more efficient approach.
acf.white_label_partner_title: Benefits of Using Hyvä on Your Magento Store

partner_repeater.title: Lightning-Fast Performance: Hyvä’s optimized code reduces loading times, improving Core Web Vitals and boosting search rankings, customer satisfaction, and reducing bounce rates.
Cost-Effective Development: Hyvä saves 20–50% in development time compared to traditional themes, lowering costs and accelerating time-to-market for your store.
Enhanced User Experience : With responsive, intuitive design, Hyvä ensures a seamless shopping experience across devices, increasing engagement and conversions.
Reduced Cart Abandonment: Hyvä Checkout speeds up and simplifies the checkout process, minimizing load times and boosting conversion rates by reducing cart abandonment.
Scalability for Growth: Hyvä supports advanced features like B2B, loyalty programs, and Adobe Commerce integrations, making it ideal for businesses of all sizes.
Lower Technical Complexity: Hyvä leverages Magento’s native PHP system, eliminating the need for complex headless solutions and simplifying development and maintenance.

faqs.title: What is the Hyvä theme, and how does it differ from other Magento themes?
faqs.description: The Hyvä theme is a modern frontend framework for Magento 2, designed for exceptional speed and performance. It reduces complexity and dependencies compared to the default Luma theme, resulting in a faster, more efficient, and customizable e-commerce experience.

faqs.title: How can Hyvä theme improve my store's performance?
faqs.description: Hyvä theme enhances your store's speed, responsiveness, and SEO scores by streamlining the frontend code and reducing bloat. This leads to quicker load times and a better user experience, ultimately boosting conversions.

faqs.title: Can Mage Monkeys customize the Hyvä theme for my specific business needs?
faqs.description: Yes, Mage Monkeys offers comprehensive customization services for the Hyvä theme. Our expert developers can tailor the theme to fit your unique requirements, ensuring a distinctive and engaging user experience.

faqs.title: What kind of support and maintenance do you provide for Hyvä theme stores?
faqs.description: We offer 24/7 support and maintenance for Hyvä theme stores, addressing technical issues, bug fixes, security vulnerabilities, and performance optimization to ensure your site runs smoothly and efficiently.

faqs.title: Is Hyvä theme compatible with third-party extensions?
faqs.description: Hyvä theme is compatible with many third-party extensions, and we can develop custom extensions to enhance your store's functionality. Our team ensures seamless integration to maintain optimal performance and user experience.
